alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:00AM CDT until April 05 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Simpson County in central Mississippi... Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northwestern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Southeastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 600 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Peyton to near Hamburg, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brookhaven, Crystal Springs, Hazlehurst, Mendenhall, Pinola, Union, Wesson, Bude, Enterprise, Union Church, Caseyville, Mccall Creek, Bogue Chitto, Hamburg, West Lincoln, Little Springs, Center Point, Shivers, Kirby and Martinsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CDT for central, south central and southwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Copiah; Franklin; Jefferson; Lawrence; Lincoln; Simpson
